action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The giant makes two attacks, using Stone Sword or Boulder in any combination.

action.name: Stone Sword
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +8, reach 15 ft. Hit: 21 (3d10 + 5) Slashing damage.

action.name: Boulder
action.text: Ranged Attack Roll: +8, range 60/240 ft. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.

action.name: Sleep (Recharge 5–6) (Bonus Action)
action.text: The giant falls into a deep, restorative slumber. The giant gains 20 Temporary Hit Points and has the Unconscious condition until it takes damage or the end of its next turn. The giant has Advantage on ability checks and saving throws for 1 minute.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The giant makes three attacks, using Tree Club or Boulder in any combination.

action.name: Tree Club
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +9 to Hit, reach 15 ft. Hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) Bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Boulder
action.text: Ranged Attack Roll: +9 to Hit, range 60/240 ft. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.

action.name: Wild Magic Cataclysm (Recharge 5–6)
action.text: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 15, each creature in a 20-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point within 120 feet. Failure: 28 (8d6) damage (roll 1d4 to determine damage type: 1—Acid; 2—Fire; 3—Lightning; 4—Thunder). Success: Half damage.

trait.name: Ephemeral Movement
trait.text: The incarnation can move through other creatures and objects as if they were Difficult Terrain, and its movement doesn't provoke Opportunity Attacks. It takes 5 (1d10) Force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The incarnation has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The incarnation makes three attacks, using Bite or Miasmic Globule in any combination.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +8, reach 5 ft. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) Piercing damage.

action.name: Miasmic Globule
action.text: Ranged Attack Roll: +8 to Hit, range 60/120 ft. Hit: 15 (6d4) Acid damage, and the target's Speed is reduced by 10 feet until the end of the incarnation's next turn.

action.name: Spectral Stampede
action.text: The incarnation moves up to 80 feet in a straight line. Each creature whose space the incarnation enters is targeted once by the following effect. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 16. Failure: 18 (4d8) Force damage. If the target is the incarnation's size or smaller, it has the Prone condition. Success: Half damage only.

action.name: Shape-Shift (Bonus Action)
action.text: The incarnation changes its size to Medium, Large, or Huge.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The incarnation has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The incarnation makes two Vine attacks and uses Radiant Blast. It can replace one vine attack with a use of Spellcasting to cast Blindness/Deafness if available.

action.name: Spellcasting
action.text:
The incarnation casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability:
• At will: Daylight, Druidcraft, Plant Growth • 1/day: Blindness/Deafness

action.name: Vine
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +9 to Hit, reach 20 ft. Hit: 18 (3d8 + 5) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is the incarnation's size or smaller, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 15) from one of two vines.

action.name: Radiant Blast
action.text: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 17, each creature of the incarnation's choice in a 20-foot Emanation originating from the incarnation. Failure: The creature takes 14 (2d8 + 5) Radiant damage. Success: Half damage.

action.name: Shape-Shift (Bonus Action)
action.text: The incarnation changes its size to Medium, Large, or Huge.

action.name: Teleport (Bonus Action)
action.text: The incarnation teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. The incarnation can't teleport while it has a creature Grappled.

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The merrow can breathe air and water.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The merrow makes three attacks, using Coral Scepter and Poisoned Longbow in any combination.

action.name: Coral Scepter
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +7 to Hit, reach 5 ft. Hit: 14 (2d10 + 4) Bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Poisoned Longbow
action.text: Ranged Attack Roll: +7 to Hit, range 150/600 ft. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) Piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) Poison damage.

action.name: Invective
action.text: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 15, up to three creatures the merrow can see within 60 feet. Failure: 14 (4d6) Psychic damage, and the creature has Disadvantage on its next attack roll before the end of the merrow's next turn. Success: Half damage only.

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The merrow can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Mimicry
trait.text: The merrow can mimic voices and animal sounds. A creature that hears the mimicries can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 15 Wisdom (Insight) check.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The merrow makes three Spined Tail attacks. It can replace one of these attacks with a use of Spellcasting to cast Command.

action.name: Spellcasting
action.text:
The merrow casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13):
• At will: Command, Mage Hand, Minor Illusion

action.name: Spined Tail
action.text: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +6 to Hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) Piercing damage.

trait.name: Siege Monster
trait.text: The noggle deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Sabotaging Swipe
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +4 to Hit, reach 5 ft. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) Slashing damage. If the target is wearing armor, it is subjected to the following effect. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 12. Failure: The armor takes a -1 penalty to the AC it offers. The target can take an action to remove the penalty from its armor.

action.name: Nimble Escape (Bonus Action)
action.text: The noggle takes the Disengage or Hide action.

trait.name: Bloodied Wild Magic
trait.text: While Bloodied, the noggle has a Fly Speed of 30 feet and it can choose for any damage it deals to be Force damage.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The noggle makes two attacks, using Noggling Stick or Befuddling Ray in any combination.

action.name: Noggling Stick
action.text: Melee Attack Roll: +5 to Hit, reach 5 ft. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) Bludgeoning damage plus 2 (1d4) Psychic damage.

action.name: Befuddling Ray
action.text: Ranged Attack Roll: +5 to Hit, range 60 ft. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) Psychic damage, and the target subtracts 1d4 from the next saving throw it makes before the end of the noggle's next turn.
